\newcommand{\ottdruleStepXXCTX}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\texttt{\textcolor{red}{<<no parses (char 14):   E \mbox{$\mid$}- \mbox{?} --> v*** >>}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{Step\_CTX}}{}%
}}

\end{ottdefnblock}}
